titleStmt.title: A sermon preached before the queenes maiestie at Hampton Court, on Sunday the 16. day of October: By I. Hopkins, one of his maiesties chaplaines in ordinarie
titleStmt.author: Hopkins, John, fl. 1604-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by F. K[ingston] for Thomas Man,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect; title page torn and stained.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
